TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SessionStateUtility extends System.Object
public ref class SessionStateUtility abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供工作階段狀態模組和工作階段狀態存放區提供者所使用的 Helper 方法，以管理 ASP.NET 應用程式的工作階段資訊。

span.span: Provides helper methods used by session-state modules and session-state store providers to manage session information for an ASP.NET application.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供靜態 helper 方法所使用的工作階段狀態模組或工作階段狀態存放區提供者。The class provides static helper methods that are used by a session-state module or a session-state store provider. 應用程式開發人員將不需要從其程式碼呼叫這些方法。Application developers will not need to call these methods from their code. 下表說明的工作階段狀態模組和工作階段狀態存放區提供者使用方法的方式。The following table describes the ways the session-state module and session-state store provider use the methods. |方法Method|使用Use| |------------|---------| | 方法 method|可以用自訂的工作階段狀態模組來擷取現有的工作階段的工作階段資訊，或建立新的工作階段的工作階段資訊。Can be used by custom session-state modules to either retrieve session information for an existing session or create session information for a new session.| | 方法 method|將工作階段資料新增至目前工作階段狀態模組稱為並使其可透過應用程式程式碼屬性。Called by the session-state module to add the session data to the current and make it available to application code through the property.| | 方法 method|呼叫期間的工作階段狀態模組或是結尾的要求，以清除 從目前的工作階段資料的事件。Called by the session-state module during the or events at the end of a request, to clear session data from the current .| | 方法 method|呼叫以取得參考的工作階段狀態模組Global.asax 檔案中定義的物件為基礎的集合。Called by the session-state module to get a reference to the collection based on objects defined in the Global.asax file. 傳回的集合就會加入至目前的工作階段資料包含。The collection returned is included with the session data added to the current .| 傳遞至工作階段資料並擷取從目前作為物件或任何有效實作介面。Session data is passed to and retrieved from the current as an object or any valid implementation of the interface. 如需實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者資訊，請參閱[實作工作階段狀態存放區提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66)。For information about implementing a session-state store provider, see [Implementing a Session-State Store Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/baadfec5-c881-468a-9681-7d8796b05a66). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示會將工作階段資訊儲存在記憶體中使用的自訂工作階段狀態模組實作。The following code example shows a custom session-state module implementation that stores session information in memory using a . 此模組會使用類別來參考目前並，擷取目前，並引發**Session_OnEnd** asp.net Global.asax 檔案中定義的事件應用程式。The module uses the class to reference the current and , retrieve the current , and raise the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. 此應用程式不會防止同步 Web 要求使用相同的工作階段識別項。This application does not prevent simultaneous Web requests from using the same session identifier. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#1)] 若要使用此自訂的工作階段狀態模組中的 ASP.NET 應用程式，您可以取代現有參考在 Web.config 檔案中，如下列範例所示。To use this custom session-state module in an ASP.NET application, you can replace the existing reference in the Web.config file, as shown in the following example. ``` ```

related.span: ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

param.span: 要加入 物件的 物件。

param.span: 要加入至指定 HTTP 內容的 實作執行個體。

summary.span: 將工作階段資料套用至目前要求的內容。

span.span: Applies the session data to the context for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由工作階段狀態模組来套用至目前要求的工作階段資料。The method is used by a session-state module to apply session data to the current request. 這會發生在在要求開始事件。This occurs during the event at the beginning of a request. 目前要求的工作階段資料是擷取現有工作階段或是建立新的工作階段。Session data for the current request is either retrieved for an existing session or created for a new session. 工作階段資料然後封裝在實作執行個體，傳遞給方法，以及目前。The session data is then encapsulated in an implementation instance, which is passed to the method along with the current . 提供的工作階段資料接著會透過應用程式程式碼提供目前內容的屬性。The supplied session data is then made available to application code through the property of the current context. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示處理常式自訂的工作階段狀態模組中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 自訂模組擷取現有的工作階段資訊，或建立新的工作階段資訊，並使用方法，以將它新增至目前要求。The custom module retrieves existing session information or creates new session information and uses the method to add it to the of the current request. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

exception.span: 目前工作階段的 物件已加入至指定的 。

span.span: An object for the current session has already been added to the specified .

span.span: Retrieves session data from the context for the current request.

returns.span: 使用目前要求的工作階段資料填入的 實作執行個體。

span.span: An implementation instance populated with session data from the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以由工作階段狀態模組用來擷取目前要求的工作階段資料。The method can be used by a session-state module to retrieve session data from the current request. 這會發生在事件結尾的要求。This occurs during the event at the end of a request. 傳回的工作階段資料再寫入工作階段資料存放區。The returned session data can then be written to the session data store. 如果已放棄的工作階段，可以從資料存放區中移除的工作階段資料和，而**Session_OnEnd**可以執行事件。If the session has been abandoned, the session data can be removed from the data store and , and the **Session_OnEnd** event can be executed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示處理常式自訂的工作階段狀態模組中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 模組會擷取工作階段資料，從目前的要求使用方法。The module retrieves session data from the for the current request using the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#5)]

para.span: 您可以使用方法，以移除工作階段資料從內部存放區中，而方法以引發事件。

span.span: You can use the method to remove session data from the internal store, and the method to raise the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來擷取在 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中定義的靜態物件的集合。The method is used to retrieve the collection of static objects defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application. 工作階段狀態模組實作會提供傳回集合實作的執行個體加入至目前的內容使用方法。A session-state module implementation will supply the returned collection to the implementation instance that is added to the current context using the method. A也可以使用方法建立時物件。A can also use the method when creating a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示處理常式自訂的工作階段狀態模組中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 模組會擷取現有的工作階段資訊，或建立新的工作階段資訊，包括所傳回的集合方法，並將它加入目前要求。The module retrieves existing session information or creates new session information, including the collection returned from the method, and adds it to the of the current request. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#4)]

summary.span: 執行在 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中所定義的 **Session_OnEnd** 事件。

span.span: Executes the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可由工作階段狀態模組來執行**Session_OnEnd** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔案中定義的事件。The method is used by a session-state module to execute the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for an ASP.NET application. 工作階段狀態模組會呼叫方法時已放棄的工作階段，或如果工作階段過期。A session-state module will call the method when a session has been abandoned, or if the session expires. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示處理常式自訂的工作階段狀態模組中的事件。The following code example shows the handler for the event in a custom session-state module. 如果已放棄的工作階段，此模組會執行**Session_OnEnd**應用程式使用 Global.asax 檔案中定義的事件方法。If the session has been abandoned, the module executes the **Session_OnEnd** event defined in the Global.asax file for the application using the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/CS/mysessionstatemodule.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility/VB/mysessionstatemodule.vb#5)]
